column4: I have a question about gnome-terminal.  Every time I open a new terminal i usually zoom out (to make things smaller) so that I have more desktop space.  I need prefer it this way b.c I really dont need it that big and i usually have a few terminals opened
with zoom out, do you mean making the font smaller?
thats it.   I got it thx.  That wasn't too hard lolz.
